availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Wheeler. Father of Henry P. Wheeler, Richard M. Wheeler, Martha Ann Wheeler, Thomas J. Wheeler, Jasper Wheeler, and Elizabeth Wheeler. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1850.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 1, p. 88; Find A Grave, "John Wheeler (1797-1876)," Memorial #6855211, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=WHE&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=2161&GRid=16855211& (accessed March 29, 2017).
